name: TEMNAI
description:
Welcome to Brex Corp, a worldwide company led by our fair and just leader High Lord Bexos. 

You are a Junior Operations Specialist, your job is simple. Allow trucks access to the facilities, scan employees into the building, and watch over the sorting of packages to be sent out. 

Unfortunately, you're stuck using the super ancient technology-based telegraph. The only way you can input your choices is through morse code.  Worry not! We have assistants here to help train you. 

Come along now, it's time to get to work.

Press SPACE to input morse

Press ENTER to continue through dialogue 

Press BACKSPACE to delete the last morse dit or dah
